Jej dieťa zomrelo, no ona považuje umelú bábiku za živú. Servant je mindfuckovým seriálom od M. Night Shyamalana
07 Nov 2019, 12:01 by Dominik Vetrák

Najzaujímavejší projekt z dielne Apple TV Plus ukazuje prvý trailer.

Ide o hororový seriál od M. Night Shyamalana. Toho môžeš poznať ako režiséra filmov, ako Unbreakable, Signs, The Sixth Sense, Villige, The Visit, ale aj Happening, After Earth, Glass a iných veľkých sklamaní. Človek nikdy nevie, čo od neho má z kvalitatívneho hľadiska vlastne čakať.
Apple to s ním ale risklo, a tak pre nich pripravil mysteriózny, sčasti mindfuckový seriál s názvom Servant. O projekte sa veľa nevie a tvorcovia si chcú nechať čo najviac prekvapení pre diváka, čomu prispôsobili aj prvý trailer.. Dej nás zavedie do filadelfskej rodiny, ktorá zažije niečo strašné a do ich životov sa vkradne zlo.
Zlo možno predstavuje opatrovateľka, ktorú si manželský pár najal na to, aby sa starala o ich dieťa. To je však už dávno mŕtve. Manžel si uvedomil, že jeho lásku od zošalenia zachráni len predstieranie toho, že bábika žije a je to ich dieťa. Tomuto však uverila aj opatrovateľka, na čo sa začnú diať naozaj divné veci. Dej sa má prakticky odohrávať v jednom dobe a Shyamalan pravdepodobne zrežíroval len pilot. Prvá séria má dokopy 10 dielov. Na Apple TV Plus štartuje exkluzívne 28. novembra.




ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ
text:
Her baby died, but she considers the doll to be alive. Servant is a mindfuck series by M. Night Shyamlan
07 Nov 2019, 12:01 by Dominik Vetrak

The most interesting project from Apple TV Plus shows the first trailer.

This is a horror series by M. Night Shyamlan. You can know him as a director of movies like Unbreakable, Signs, The Sixth Sense, Villige, The Visit, but also Happening, After Earth, Glass and other big disappointments. One never knows what to expect from a qualitative point of view.
But Apple took a risk with him, so he prepared a mysterious, partly mindfuck series called Servant. Little is known about the project and the filmmakers want to leave as much surprise to the viewer as the first trailer adapted. The story takes us to a Philadelphia family that experiences something terrible and evil is stolen into their lives.
Maybe evil is a babysitter hired by a married couple to look after their child. But that is dead long ago. Her husband realized that his love of going mad would only be saved by pretending that the doll was alive and was their child. However, this was also believed by the caregiver, for which really strange things start to happen. The plot is to be practically happening at one time, and Shyamalan was probably only directed by the pilot. The first series has a total of 10 parts. Apple TV Plus starts exclusively on November 28th.
